name: Options Strategy Plugin
description: This plugin provides option trading strategies for given tickers and specific future weeks based on user queries.

endpoints.name: Get Options Strategies
endpoints.description: Retrieve options trading strategies based on specified ticker and weeks out.

query_parameters.name: ticker
query_parameters.description: The ticker symbol of the underlying security.

query_parameters.name: weeksout
query_parameters.description: Number of weeks out to fetch options for.
